snippet: Mariano Rivera will return to the Yankees on a one-year, $10 million deal that all but completes the team’s pitching needs. But now the Yankees need an everyday catcher to replace Russell Martin.
abstract: New York Yankees finalize one-year, $10 million deal with pitcher Mariano Rivera, all but completing the team’s pitching needs; team is now focused on replacing catcher Russell Martin, who agreed to a two-year deal with Pittsburgh Pirates.
lead_paragraph: Mariano Rivera will return to the Yankees on a one-year, $10 million deal that all but completes the team’s pitching needs. But now the Yankees need an everyday catcher to replace Russell Martin.

headline.seo: Yankees and Mariano Rivera Finalize Deal
headline.main: Rivera Deal Is Finalized; Now Catcher Is Priority
headline.print_headline: Rivera Deal Is Finalized; Now Catcher Is Priority
